long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This is a tooltip designed specifically for the Random Battle mode of the site Pokemon Showdown. The tooltip provides useful data on an enemy's item, ability, moves, and stats that far exceeds data found on the default tooltip. All data is expressed in probabilities. This data changes dynamically as the enemy reveals some of their information over the course of a game.
